website_summaries.verdict: Offers more aesthetic appeal than quality considering the high price –we recommend others we reviewed instead.
pros: A large, natural-looking log ornament with spacious hiding area for large fish
Sports beautiful detailing in a one-piece design
cons: It has some sharp edges, and the tendency to alter the pH level of the aquarium water
It's also the most expensive on our list

customer_reviews.title: Exotic Environments Hollow Tree Stump Review
customer_reviews.text: We were very happy with this purchase. We are using it in our 30 gal tank. We have upside down swimming catfish and they dont like the bright lights from above all that much so this gives them a great place to hide. With all decorations we needed to wash it and some of the outside flaked off. But all in all its perfect for what we needed and a great price for the size.
customer_reviews.author: KennethPreslerTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: All color comes off in water in weeks
customer_reviews.text: Received as expected and the reviews stating the color was a lot darker was true. Update- after A month of being in a fresh water aquarium both trunks leaked all its color into the water. Not safe and waste of money! I should definitely get a full refund on both!!! See pictures below. First photo after a month, second photo after 2 weeks and taking it out for my fishes health.
customer_reviews.author: Paradise ranch

customer_reviews.title: It's a gorgeous pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous piece. Huge in size. My fire eel loves it. But it's ruining my pH. I usually have an easy time keeping all my tanks at 7.0. But this thing is making the pH in my tank skyrocket. I've got driftwood in the tank and check the water daily but can't get my level down. Lots of sharp edges, I don't recommend for spastic fish.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Potentially dangerous sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not fish-safe. I had to sand down sharp edges where the mold comes together. I love the piece, but the makers should consider sanding it down themselves before selling it. If someone with an expensive fish orders this, it could result in an injured fish and a lawsuit. With how expensive it is, you'd think they'd put in a little effort for the safety of the fish in the aquarium.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Jones

customer_reviews.title: The log is very nice in appearance
customer_reviews.text: The log is very nice in appearance , however as other reviewers have stated it has very sharp edges not only for fish but for humans. After about 20 minutes using a round file the problem was corrected. But for the price I don't think one should have to do that.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great Retreat for some loveable loaches
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my tank! My loaches were fast outgrowing the stump/roots ornament I had in there, so they needed something larger to hide in. This exceeded their needs and they will enjoy this piece for the next few years of their lives. It is by far the tallest ornament I've had, and it works very well in my tank. There have been a few comments on the colors fading rather quickly. I have had no such issue. It looks as good as the day it went in! My tank is a 10"x20"x24" 25 gal if anyone is looking for scale.
customer_reviews.author: Cat R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect log for a 20" Plecostomus
customer_reviews.text: I needed a decoration of sorts that would big enough to allow my 20" pleco room to swim through. I've tried all sorts logs for aquariums and even terrariums. The description says X-Large and sure enough, not nearly big enough. I had a temporary solution, but needed a final home. I bought this one thinking it could very well be one more miss. I was wrong. Completely big enough for the pleco to swim through, and still be able to peek though the side hole. I can't say enough. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A. Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Great size, decent look, but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Great size and a pretty decent realistic look. Unfortunately, the quality of the resin is poor. The edges on the openings are sharp(enough to actually cut my finger when I ran it along it). And the inside resin is messy and the droops leave sharp edges as well. Decent product, maybe expensive for the price but works after careful sanding.
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: Great center piece for my Aquarium
customer_reviews.text: I like this as it provides a good hiding / sleeping place for all my fish.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Waddle

customer_reviews.title: Sharp & dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Bought and returned this product. While I really liked the size and look, it (or at least the one I received) had MANY sharp edges. Putting my hand on any opening I could easily feel several points sticking me. Please be very careful if you put this in your aquarium. It's not worth risking the health of your fish.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: Top crumbled in my hand the 1st time I moved it (gently)...save your money & time and keep shopping
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I sooo wanted not to believe the reviews! Color is way more dull than is showed. I've had it in my tank for about two months and the first time I went to move it I crumbled a huge chunk off the top rim...literally crumbled! Now I'm afraid to shift it in my tank until I have the spare cash to buy a new corner piece. Total waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Johansen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Fish Decor
customer_reviews.text: My fish love this log. I have had no problem with water or any other issue as per other reviews. I would purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Twins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome decor
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my 55 gal tank, see picture for size to make your choice. Well package, this thing is huge thank you .
customer_reviews.author: Adrian A.

customer_reviews.title: Exotic Environments Hollow Tree Trunk
customer_reviews.text: Love it. had one for over fifteen years, but it had gotten discolred, tho still intact. my cleaner fish is very happy to . i had worried that he, or she would be upset, yet no.you can see he or she, at the top of the aquarium..
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A Holt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked well in my 4ft aquarium. Didn't notice any sharp edges that others had comment on?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: better than i thought
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and so does my placo. It looks much better in person than in the pic. smells a little funny when you get it but nothing a quick wash won't fix. overall a good product and looks good in my tank
customer_reviews.author: TIFF

customer_reviews.title: I loved the colors of it and it never faded
customer_reviews.text: I bought this decoration for a hexagon aquarium. I needed something with height so it worked perfectly. I loved the colors of it and it never faded. Great price versus what it is sold for in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with my purchase. Needed a larger hiding place for my growing fuelleborni and this was perfect. It would be a little to big in smaller tanks, but works well in my 55 gallon. Looks great, good craftsmanship with no sharp or jagged edges, and my fish absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: CMoZRo

customer_reviews.title: wish it was right
customer_reviews.text: my fish could have swam in it. if it was right
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Not for aggressive fish
customer_reviews.text: Had this in my 120 tank for my Jaguar Cichlid, Molly. She loved it, would lay her eggs in it and considered it home. Unfortunately it had a very sharp texture to it and would cut her up pretty good seeing she is so spastic. In the right tank this would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: B. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: enormous log. have a big aquarium if you getting this one. lol
customer_reviews.author: denis sajaev

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any tank that is big enough!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty big log! I have 2 large oscars and the smaller of the two loves to swim through it. It's a really cute addition to any tank, and it looks relatively natural and is well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Very tall. Provides shelter for the fish and is very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Megh Shmeg

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than I was picturing, but dimensions are exactly as advertised so it was my imagination that was off. Seems high quality, looks great in my tank.
customer_reviews.author: Yoimbrian

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Had it for years in my fish tank. Colors stay sharp and the fish love it. It's a great Addison to a plain dull tank.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kocher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks really cool. big! I put a bubble disk in it as well.
customer_reviews.author: A & M

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Had it for years in my fish tank. Colors stay sharp and the fish love it. It's a great Addison to a plain dull tank.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kocher

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for my big pleco
customer_reviews.text: The edges are a little rough and could cause injury to your fish. For the price I would have expected it to be a little safer without modification.
customer_reviews.author: NoVA

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect decoration for a large aquarium. My fish love using it as a hide out. Make sure that you look at the dimensions of this item. it is larger than it looks on the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 14" catfish loves it same with all the other fish
customer_reviews.author: ...ratings...

customer_reviews.title: the fish seem to like
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my backyard pond, the fish seem to like it
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a hiding place for my koi in the bottom of my small pond.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful in an aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful in an aquarium! Well made and heavy duty but do not order for small aquariums because this is a LARGE piece!
customer_reviews.author: Angie K

customer_reviews.title: Nice & BIG!!
customer_reviews.text: So large, and good for big fish to hide....pricey, but cheaper than the pet stores here.
customer_reviews.author: J. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Best buy ever
customer_reviews.text: I have a foot long sucker fish and this is the perfect hiding place for him. He loves it and it looks beautiful as the center piece in my 60 gallon tank
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fullwood

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought along with the tree stump for my 55 gallon tank and they look incredible!! Love it! Worth while purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bronco gram

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ;I have a 55 gallon tank and it looks incredible and oh yeah my 8" long Pleco looooves it!
customer_reviews.author: Bronco gram

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This piece was much bigger and nicer than pictured. I placed it in my new 55 gallon tank. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wright

customer_reviews.title: really cool
customer_reviews.text: bigger than i thought and colorful and very realistic . i would recommend this product with anyone with a 55gal tank or bigger
customer_reviews.author: mada433

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: I received this item on time but it was broken. I will not order stuff like this again it's to fragile to be shipped by mail and I spent way too much money for it to be broken
customer_reviews.author: Amber Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My fishes loves hiding out in this hollow log, fits perfectly in my aquarium.
customer_reviews.author: Demon

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: After rinsing it thoroughly and putting this decoration in my aquarium, I noticed a very strong paint odor! Let it set for awhile and rinsed more but it never even weakened! It makes me gag so I can't imagine what it would do to fish swimming in that toxic water.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamtangled

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This product is dangerous. It turned the water brown and then began to fall apart. This was the only new item added to the tank. I had all of these fish since 2007, I purchased it for my very large pleco. This item killed all of my fish.
customer_reviews.author: pam J

product_meta.title: Blue Ribbon Exotic Environments Hollow
product_meta.description: Style:LogExotic Environments Hollow Log Aquarium Ornament is made with durable poly resin, 18-inch by 8-1/2-inch by 9-inch
feature_bullets: Safe for Freshwater and Marine Aquariums and Terrariums
Large Swim through holes for fish, makes a great centerpiece for large tanks
